amendment.description: To include a provision relating to Four Mile Run, city of Alexandria and Arlington County, Virginia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 873 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 873 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Warner.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 873 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Warner.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 873 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
